nml_option.name: config_AM_globalStats_enable
nml_option.description: If true, landice analysis member globalStats is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_globalStats_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computations should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_globalStats_stream_name
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the globalStats analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_globalStats_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if analysis member computations occur on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_globalStats_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

package.name: globalStatsAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the globalStats analysis member.

var.name: totalIceVolume
var.description: total ice sheet volume

var.name: volumeAboveFloatation
var.description: total ice sheet volume above floatation

var.name: totalIceArea
var.description: total ice sheet area

var.name: floatingIceVolume
var.description: total floating ice sheet volume

var.name: floatingIceArea
var.description: total floating ice sheet area

var.name: groundedIceVolume
var.description: total grounded ice sheet volume

var.name: groundedIceArea
var.description: total grounded ice sheet area

var.name: iceThicknessMean
var.description: spatially averaged ice thickness

var.name: iceThicknessMax
var.description: maximum ice thickness in domain

var.name: iceThicknessMin
var.description: minimum ice thickness in domain

var.name: totalSfcMassBal
var.description: total, area integrated surface mass balance. Positive values represent ice gain.

var.name: avgNetAccumulation
var.description: average sfcMassBal, as a thickness rate. Positive values represent ice gain.

var.name: totalBasalMassBal
var.description: total, area integrated basal mass balance. Positive values represent ice gain.

var.name: totalGroundedBasalMassBal
var.description: total, area integrated grounded basal mass balance. Positive values represent ice gain.

var.name: avgGroundedBasalMelt
var.description: average groundedBasalMassBal value, as a thickness rate. Positive values represent ice loss.

var.name: totalFloatingBasalMassBal
var.description: total, area integrated floating basal mass balance. Positive values represent ice gain.

var.name: avgSubshelfMelt
var.description: average floatingBasalMassBal value, as a thickness rate. Positive values represent ice loss.

var.name: totalCalvingFlux
var.description: total, area integrated mass loss due to calving. Positive values represent ice loss.

var.name: groundingLineFlux
var.description: total mass flux across all grounding lines. Note that flux from floating to grounded ice makes a negative contribution to this metric.

var.name: surfaceSpeedMax
var.description: maximum surface speed in the domain

var.name: basalSpeedMax
var.description: maximum basal speed in the domain
